dmca.title: Fwd: [ABUSE] easedoor.com: Infringement of Japan X: DMCA Notice
dmca.body:

Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] easedoor.com: Infringement of Japan X: DMCA Notice
Importance: High

> record) client-ip=208.179.13.2; envelope- from=dean@deanserwin.com;

> X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
> X-Spam-Score: -99.8

> X-Beenthere: abuse@lists.theplanet.com
> X-Mailman-Version: 2.1.5
> Precedence: list
> List-Id: abuse.lists.theplanet.com
> List-Unsubscribe: <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/
> abuse>, <mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=unsubscribe>
> List-Post: <mailto:abuse@lists.theplanet.com>
> List-Help: <mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=help>

> abuse>, <mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=subscribe>
> Sender: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
> Errors-To: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
>
>
> Please see the attached DMCA Notice.
>
>
> This matter requires your immediate attention.
>
>
> Please excuse the required formality and urgency of this notice, 
> however, my client demands that you please immediately do both of the 
> following:
>
>
> 1. Disable access to the individual or company who has engaged in  
> the conduct described above, and;
>
> 2. Take appropriate action against the account holder under your  
> Abuse Policy/Terms of Service Agreement.
>
> Completeness requires that I should point out the following to you:
>
> 1. The distribution of unauthorized copies of copyrighted motion  
> pictures constitutes copyright infringement under the Copyright  
> Act, Title 17 United States Code Section 106(3). This conduct may  
> also violate the laws of other countries, international law, and/or  
> treaty obligations.
>
> 2. Pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, Title 17  
> United States Code Section 512, that we have a good faith belief  
> that use of the material in the manner complained of is not  
> authorized by the copyright owners, their respective agents, or the  
> law.
>
> 3. Copyright law is a strict liability tort and does not require  
> the entity committing the infringement, or responsible for the  
> infringement, to be aware that their actions are in violation of  
> law. The absence of knowledge, or even intent, does not negate the  
> infringement and is not a defense.  Contributory copyright  
> infringement requires that the entity know, or should have known,  
> that they were inducing, causing or materially contributing to the  
> commission of a direct infringement. Material or activity which  
> promotes the commission of an  infringement, therefore, may  
> constitute contributory infringement.
>
>
>
> Dean Sheldon Serwin

DEAN SHELDON SERWIN
ATTORNEY-AT-LAW
mail@deanserwin.com
1680 N. VINE STREET, SUITE 1115		       	TEL.323.465.1735
HOLLYWOOD, CALIFORNIA  90028-8837	FAX.323.465.1763

Via Email (abuse@theplanet.com) & Fax (214-________)

June 13, 2005

The Planet.com Internet Services, Inc.
1333 North Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas, TX  75207
Attn: Abuse 

	Re:	DMCA Violation
		Our Client:	IdeaMax ? Japan X
		Your Client:	Easedoor.com
		Infringed Titles:	Loose Sock, Vols; Super Idols, The Gold Edition, Vols. 10 & 14; Tokyo Nurses Vol. 1 (and possibly others)

Dear Owner / Operator:

This office is the legal representative of IdeaMax and Japan X (individually and collectively, ?Japan X?) the legal copyright owners of the above stated adult videos, among others (the ?Videos?).  Japan X is also the sole distributor of the Videos.

This office is authorized to act on behalf of Japan X in enforcing Japan X?s copyrights.

You are the ISP for hentaimoviearchive.net which has on its web pages (including the page http: www.easedoor.com/avmovie/) advertisements and links (including screen captures as well as unauthorized use of Japan X trademarks) marketing the Videos and making them available for sale and or ?download?.  Please check the site for the referenced titles.  

My client and this office each has a good faith belief that the use of the referenced material (the Videos) in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law.  Specifically, Japan X has not authorized any third-party website, including your client, to make the Videos available for download.

The information in this notice is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, and we are authorized to act on behalf of the copyright owner.

Japan X hereby demands that Your Client remove all Japan X titles from its site immediately or you shut the site down.

Sincerely,

s/DEAN SHELDON SERWIN/ (electronic signature)
cc:	Client
